homeHeader.title: Submit, Apply, Process, & Renew — End-to-End Dubai PRO Services to Launch Your Business in Days, Not Weeks
homeHeader.description: From visas to trade licenses and labor contracts to document clearances, Dubai-based PRO services are built to provide you with speed, accuracy, and 100% legal compliance. Skip the paperwork, legal complexities, and endless compliance requirements with our end-to-end solutions. With our experts, you can streamline every government interaction so your operations never skip a beat.

leftSection_1.description: Simplify business setup while staying compliant with local regulations with expert-led PRO solutions. Ensure you never have to worry about another million dirham fine with timely renewal updates and end-to-end compliance support.

leftSection_5.title: How Our Corporate Dubai PRO Services Work

items.title: Book a Delivery Call
items.description: We review your current structure, documents, and compliance needs to identify your unique PRO requirements.

items.title: Get Pre-Verifications
items.description: Next, our experts provide you with a checklist to collect the required documents, ensuring the formatting aligns with DED requirements.

items.title: Submit & Follow-Up
items.description: With all documents compiled, we streamline filings with DED, GDFRA, MOHRE, and DHA to avoid costly delays and accelerate licensing.

items.title: Secure Your Residence Visa
items.description: Next, our consultants assist you in applying for a residency visa and sponsoring your loved ones and business partners.

items.title: Receive Real-Time Updates
items.description: You’ll get instant alerts and notifications on your application, licensing, and renewals, ensuring a transparent setup process.

items.title: Get Ongoing Compliance Support
items.description: Lastly, we track visa expiry dates, labor card deadlines, and trade license renewals so you stay compliant year-round.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What are Dubai PRO services?
items.answer: PRO, or Public Relations Officer, services assist you with company registration and setup, visa application, renewals, and cancellations, mail collection, passport clearance, annual license updates, and bank account setup solutions.

items.question: Why do I need PRO Services in Dubai, UAE?
items.answer: PRO services can help your business simplify paperwork, secure permits and licenses, and ensure compliance.

items.question: Does One Nexuz offer PRO Services for mainland and free zone entities?
items.answer: Yes, our experts handle DED, TECOM, DMCC, and all major free zone requirements within Dubai.

items.question: Does One Nexuz offer PRO services for all types of businesses?
items.answer: Yes, our expert consultants provide PRO solutions for all-sized businesses and industries tailored to your unique needs.

items.question: What is the typical timeline for onboarding PRO Services?
items.answer: The timeline varies depending on the task and authority, taking 3-7 working days.
